Address.value: 525 WASHINGTON BLVD FLOOR 20-21, NO. 55, JERSEY CITY, New Jersey, 07310, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Nukkleus Inc. is a financial technology company focused on providing software and technology solutions for the worldwide crypto and retail foreign exchange (FX) trading industry. The Company primarily provides its software, technology, customer sales and marketing and risk management technology hardware and software solutions package to Triton Capital Markets Ltd. (TCM). The FXDD brand is the brand utilized in the retail forex trading industry by TCM. It provides software technology and technical support to TCM in each of these seven service categories: Introducing Broker Dealer Network and the Introducing Broker Interface; Chinese and Middle East customer desk support; Bridging software to the XWare (MT4 and MT5) platforms; Forex Market Liquidity Access; Turnkey risk management support software and Risk Management Team; Front End Software Retail Trading Platforms and Customer Application Systems, and Back Office Systems management.
